results.name: Battle of the Squares (Gaming Project at VT)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible Sound Card
  • VR Support: Can be run on Integrated Graphics, just lower the settings to "Low" and lower the resolution and resolution scale to your preference.
  • Additional Notes: Recommendation for running at 720p, 60 frames per second at low/medium settings
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7200U
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible Sound Card
  • VR Support: Requires Unreal Engine Prerequisites and Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable.
  • Additional Notes: Recommendation for running at 1080p, 60 frames per second at high settings.

results.name: Rise of the High Elf King: A LEGACY OF BLOOD

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), iOS 8.0, Android 4.4.4*
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
